com.hazelcast.spi

Interface OperationResponseHandler<O extends Operation>

  • Type Parameters:
    O - type of the Operation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CacheClearExpiredRecordsTask, Invocation, LocalRetryableExecution, MapClearExpiredRecordsTask, OutboundResponseHandler

    public interface OperationResponseHandler<O extends Operation>
    A handler for the OperationService when it has calculated a response. This way you can hook into the Operation execution and decide what to do with it: for example, send it to the right machine.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void sendResponse(O op, Object response)
      Sends a response.

    • Method Detail

      • sendResponse

        void sendResponse(O op,
                  Object response)
        Sends a response.
        Parameters:
        op - the operation that got executed.
        response - the response of the operation that got executed.
        Throws:
        HazelcastSerializationException - if response is not serializable or contains non serializable object inside NormalResponse
